alert.note: Alert for Bath; Estill; Fleming; Lee; Menifee; Montgomery; Powell; Rowan (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 15 at 9:29PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Showers containing gusty winds will impact portions of Powell, Montgomery, Bath, Estill, western Menifee, northwestern Lee, Fleming and central Rowan Counties through 1030 PM EDT... At 927 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking showers along a line extending from near Highlands to Pryse. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds of 30 to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Gusty winds will be near... Knowlton around 935 PM EDT. Rogers Chapel and Slade around 940 PM EDT. Stanton, Bowen, Cat Creek, Rosslyn, Lombard, Nada and Haystack around 945 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Campsites in the Indian Creek area of the Daniel Boone National Forrest, Bean, Jeffersonville, Cornwell, Rothwell, Cedar Groves, Means, Fagan, Clay Lick, Tabor, Lucky Stop, Frenchburg, Hope, Walkers Crossing, Peeled Oak, Oggs Station, Olympia Springs, Sudith, Preston, Crooks, Ratlitt, Kendall Springs, Marshall, Salt Lick, Polksville, Young Springs, Olympia, Bourbon Furnace, Craigs and Yale. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Bath; Estill; Fleming; Lee; Menifee; Montgomery; Powell; Rowan
